  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2632</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">How a Dynamometer functions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie ein Dynamometer arbeitet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment un dynamomètre fonctionne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como um dinamômetro funciona</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come un dinamometro funziona</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς ένα δυναμόμετρο λειτουργεί</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo funciona un dinamómetro</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates the forces acting on a spring which is connected to different weights.iThe animation illustrates the realtion between the intensity of the force and the elongation of the dynamometer’s spring.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">elasticity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">scientific instrument</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die die Kräfte zeigt, die auf 
einem Frühling fungieren, der an unterschiedliche weights.iThe 
Animation eingehakt wird, veranschaulicht das realtion zwischen der 
Intensität der Kraft und der Verlängerung der dynamometer?s 
entspringen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre les forces agissant un
ressort qui est relié à l'animation différente de weights.iThe 
illustre le realtion entre l'intensité de la force et l'élongation 
des dynamometer?s jaillissent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre as forças que agem em 
uma mola que seja conectada ao animation diferente de weights.iThe 
ilustra o realtion entre a intensidade da força e o elongation dos 
dynamometer?s salta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra le forze che si 
comportano su una molla che è collegata alla animazione differente di
weights.iThe illustra il realtion fra l'intensità della forza e 
l'allungamento dei dynamometer?s balza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει τις δυνάμεις 
ενεργώντας σε ένα ελατήριο που συνδέεται με τη διαφορετική 
ζωτικότητα weights.iThe επεξηγεί το realtion μεταξύ της 
έντασης της δύναμης και της επιμήκυνσης του ελατηρίου 
dynamometer?s.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra las fuerzas que 
actúan en un resorte que esté conectado con diversa animación de 
weights.iThe ilustra el realtion entre la intensidad de la fuerza y el
alargamiento de los dynamometer?s suelta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elastizität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">wissenschaftliches Instrument</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
